text.text_translated: Our findings show something important. We recommend a new management style for Girox Foods. This style should focus on people. We should offer flexible work hours. Workers can choose when they work. We should also let workers work from places they choose. Managers need to give workers difficult tasks. These tasks help them learn and grow. They should praise workers for their good work. They should show that the company values their work. We should spend more money to help workers develop their skills. This helps them talk with other people. It also helps them talk with people from other countries. This will create a good place to work. Then, workers can do their best work.

- The word 'flexible' is B2 level. It is not permitted at A2.
